project_short_description: A Python project in bioinformatics that will surely be the next great thing.

__prompts__.project_short_description: A short description or stinger your project, mostly for docs
__prompts__.project_shell_cmd: Shell command; set to empty string to disable

open_source_license.__prompt__: Choose a license for your project
open_source_license.MIT license: MIT License - Permissive license that requires inclusion of the copyright notice
open_source_license.GNU General Public License v3: GNU General Public License v3 - Share-alike copyleft license that requires derivative works to be licensed under the same terms
open_source_license.Public domain: Public domain - not subject to copyright
open_source_license.US Government Work Product: US Govt work product not subject to copyright in the US under 17 USC ยง 105
open_source_license.BSD license: BSD License - Permissive, almost unrestricted license that does not endorse derivative works
open_source_license.ISC license: ISC License - Permissive, almost unrestricted license in simple language
open_source_license.Apache Software License 2.0: Apache License 2.0 - Permissive, BSD-like license that also provides an express grant of patent rights from contributors
open_source_license.Not open source: Closed source or proprietary/custom license (provided by you)

wf_lang.__prompt__: Choose an optional workflow language for your project
